system.description:
Time: 15-RSI minutesRitual: Chant
Range: TouchDuration: 10 (MS); 30 (CS) days

Blesses one apple that, when eaten, prevents pregnancy and sexually-transmitted diseases for Duration. The blessing also preserves the apple for up to one year, provided it is stored in a cool, dry cellar. If five blessed apples are eaten in one day, an existing pregnancy will abort.
